name: excel_tiny_wrapper
description: excel export with type check using nodejs in super fast speed!

scripts.update_package: npm uninstall --save xlsx chalk fs-extra-promise json_to_lua moment && npm uninstall --save-dev @types/chalk @types/fs-extra-promise @types/lodash @types/moment @types/node @types/xlsx typescript && npm install --save xlsx chalk fs-extra-promise json_to_lua moment && npm install --save-dev @types/chalk @types/fs-extra-promise @types/lodash @types/moment @types/node @types/xlsx typescript

author: yhchen
